short_summary: Office Seating to be delivered to RCMP Nova Scotia
description: Office seating to be delivered to New Minas, Kingston and Wolfville Nova Scotia for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police.
full_summary:
=================
**Title:** Office Seating for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police in Nova Scotia

**Reference Number:**  cb-7197-9274565
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** M4000-01384
**Publication Date:** 2023-07-14
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-25T13:00:00

**Procurement Details:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police's Nova Scotia division invites suppliers to bid on a tender for the provision of office seating to supply their facilities in New Minas, Kingston, and Wolfville, Nova Scotia.

**Product Specifications:** 
The tender requires the delivery and installation of office seating that meets the specifications outlined in Product Sub-Category 1 (Rotary chairs and Rotary stools) and Product Sub-Category 2 (Rotary Guest Chair and Side chairs).

**Pre-Qualification:**
To be eligible to bid on this tender, suppliers must be pre-qualified and possess a valid Supply Arrangement (SA). Suppliers without an SA may still submit a bid, but they must also provide an SA for evaluation.

**Security Requirements:**
The tender includes a security requirement that requires bidders to adhere to specific guidelines outlined in the bid solicitation document.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries related to this tender, please contact Rosalee Parsons at rosalee.parsons@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Additional Resources:**
- To learn more about the pre-qualification process and obtaining a Supply Arrangement (SA), visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).
- Suppliers wishing to become pre-qualified SA holders should contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents:**
